Summary *: Verify if user is able to create Cashflow Report as per RMS
Test Steps *:
1. Navigate to Report Creation 
2. Drag columns in se-Po Number,Order Name, Supplier, Supplier Location, PO currency, Net Order Amount, Invoice No, Settlement Via, Invoice Amount, Charged Amount, Amount Paid, Amount due for Payment
Expected Test Results *: Cashflow Report should get crated in the sequence of the columns as mentioned

Summary *: Verify if cashflow report is getting summarized on Company, Bunisness Unit and Location
Test Steps *: 1. Navigate to Report Creation >>Summarize report on Company, Bunisness Unit and Location>> save the report
Expected Test Results *: Report should get summarized on CBL

Summary *: Verify if cashflow report has the filter where po status = Partially Invoiced or Fully Invoiced, Type= Standard or Release and Invoice status=approved or closed
Test Steps *:
1. Navigate to Report Creation
4. Set filters- po status = Partially Invoiced or Fully Invoiced, Type= Standard or Release and Invoice status=approved or closed
Expected Test Results *: Cashflow Report should retain such filters

Summary *: Verify if cashflow report can be summarize over sum of record count and Invoice amount
Test Steps *:
1. Navigate to Report creation
2. Drag columns as per the seq defined in RMS
4. Summarize over  sum of record count and Invoice amount
Expected Test Results *: User should be able to Summarize over  sum of record count and Invoice amount
